input.sentences: on our night in the city i took a photo of the skyline at dusk .
i sat on my laptop for most of the day | tentative to leave .
the dog was feeling like me and wanted to sleep .
i found a pair of hair clippers to give my boyfriend a haircut .
i hate hot peppers but my boyfriend insisted he put them in our dinner .
output.sentences: My weekend began by taking photos of the skyline at night.
Saturday morning i sat and watched the birds out my window, but was tentative if I should leave them alone.
I took my dog for a walk, and it left him feeling sleepy.
I decidedd to try out my new pair of clippers on my husband.
He thanked me by making dinner with hot peppers, I declined, but he insisted. I had a great weekend!
